roleset.name: think about, ponder
roleset.note: WONDER-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls care-88.1-1, (from wonder.01-v)

roles.note: Arg1 will take the entire SBAR, not just the S. (from wonder.01-v)

example.name: very typical
example.text: At the same time, the sheer size of the loss, coupled with a slowing of orders, made some securities analysts wonder just howstrong that turnaround will be at the computer maker anddefense-electronics concern.
example.arg: just how strong that turnaround will be at the computer maker and defense-electronics concern

example.name: with a PP instead
example.text: Not everyone is reacting so calmly, however, and many wonder about the long-term implications of what is widely viewed as thecause of Friday's slide, reluctance by banks to provide financingfor a buy-out of UAL Corp., parent of United Airlines.
example.arg: about the long-term implications of what is widely viewed as the cause of Friday's slide , reluctance by banks toprovide financing for a buy-out of UAL Corp., parent of UnitedAirlines

roleset.name: experience a sense of wonder, experience wonder/awe, inspire awe, wonder
roleset.note: WONDER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls marvel-31.3-1, marvel-31.3-8 (from wonder.02-v)
WONDER-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on wonder-v.02.Corresponds to VNcls marvel-31.3. (from wonder.01-n)

roles.note: Note that instances of "No wonder that __" or "small wonder that __" are not considered eventive. They are reductions of "it isno wonder that __", in which the wonder is a thing, not an event.Use .ER. (from wonder.01-n)

example.name: poor John
example.text: John wondered at the display of unreasoning hatred directed at him from all the other kids.
example.arg: at the display of unreasoning hatred directed at him from all the other kids

example.name: both args
example.text: In his wonder at the greatness of this delight he did well to call it 'the key to the Kingdom of heaven'.
example.arg: at the greatness of this delight

example.name: with MNR
example.text: This moment of childish wonder raised the curtain on the drama of his life in Taiwan .

example.name: non-eventive-- call .ER. Do not tag.
example.text: No wonder the " stock masters " featured on cable TV usually disappear from view after a brief reign , only to be replaced byequally short - lived successors .

roleset.name: generally positive, admirable
roleset.note: WONDERFUL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from wonderful.01-j)

example.name: all args
example.text: You've been so wonderful to me.

example.name: all args
example.text: She is wonderful at her job

example.name: all args
example.text: The pool is wonderful for some family down time.
